name: Distance Travellers
description:
Think Elite Dangerous but in 2D, that's what Distance Travellers is aiming to be. 

An MMO in 2D space that is infinitely expandable and with the help of players trade. Fight, trade, complete missions and upgrade your ships in this new MMO set in space. So far all we have is the online servers, chat box functions and a slightly working friend list along with a map generator. Let me know if you want to see more.

This is a very early working prototype for testing the idea and gathering feedback so please, If you do download and play PROVIDE FEEDBACK!

Let me know Ideas, bugs, issues and more.
